explains: n. 群岛，列岛；多岛的海区

sentences.en: Herpetologist Robert Mertens later argued that Varanus probably originated in the archipelago.
sentences.cn: 爬虫学家罗伯特·默滕斯后来提出，巨蜥属可能起源于这个群岛。

sentences.en: He has spent up to a third of every year on the remote archipelago in the central South Pacific.
sentences.cn: 他每年有三分之一的时间都在这个位于南太平洋中部的偏远群岛上度过。

sentences.en: In contrast to the compressed verticality system, in this system, commodities rather than people circulated through the archipelago.
sentences.cn: 与压缩的垂直系统相比，在这个系统中，是商品而不是人在群岛上流通。
